content: कन्या [<ls>Uṇ. 4. 111</ls>] {@--1@} An unmarried girl or daughter; <ls>R. 1. 51</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 10</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 33</ls>; <ls>Ms. 10. 8.</ls> {@--2@} A girl ten years old. {@--3@} A virgin, maiden; <ls>Ms. 8. 367</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 33.</ls> {@--4@} A woman in general. {@--5@} The sixth sign of the zodiac, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} Virgo. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. {@--7@} Large cardamoms.
